title: T201, T205, and T207 (WaJo, Matty, and others)
author: ronniehatesjazz

posts.post_title: T201, T205, and T207 (WaJo, Matty, and others)
posts.post_content:
Hello gentlemen, I have the cards below for sale. I had issues with scans again so I created a flickr album (link is below). Prices include shipping and preferred payment method is paypal f&f. The T205's were recently picked up on BST as a lot and I'm selling a few of the cards that I already had. I'm not the greatest at guessing grades but I've included what I believe there condition is. Please judge for yourself though. Let me know if you have any questions. 

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/74275593@N05/sets/72157682994380863[/url]


T201 Walter Johnson    PSA 4    [STRIKE]$350[/STRIKE] $325
T201 Christy Mathewson    SGC 10 (1)    [STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE] $110
T205 Christy Mathewson    Raw (P-F)    [STRIKE]$175[/STRIKE] $165
T205 Eddie Collins (mouth closed)    (Gd)    [STRIKE]$70[/STRIKE] $65
T205 Frank Baker    (Gd+)    [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] $75 SOLD
T207 Walter Johnson    PSA 2    [STRIKE]$300[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$28[STRIKE][/STRIKE]0[/STRIKE] SOLD
